text: Honestly? Rainy days just make me roll up cosier at home—don’t get why everyone gets so down! Sunny out? Great! Lead grey skies... Mon Dieu 😒 time for tea and crosswords—not less productive IMO just different vibes!
Once heard harmonica practice at midnight every Saturday — became part of weekly routine listening, guess it beats counting sheep!
Had a voisin who'd practice mime against our shared wall – eerie silent storytelling!
Pipes sang better than neighbors once 😂
Earplugs can't drown out smells. Last guy burned his dinner at 3AM weekly!
Work life's always been juggle – cut hair by day, family time squeezed in between snips! 🤷‍♀️ Adaptation's key!

Oh totally get it – back when snipping locks, clients became almost like family! Had to remind myself daily "work's at salon", left room for me-time after hours! Just takes some dedication et voila, balance achieved 😊
Once dropped serious euros on vintage curlers—collector's items now!
